About Me

About Me

I am Yodai Kadokawa. I was born and raised in Aichi prefecture, Japan.
I started playing the guitar when I was 14. After some J-pop band experienses, jazz interested me. And I traveled to New York to learn the basic skills of jazz guitar.
2017, I moved to UK. This experience has changed my life. It made me feel that not only music can make my life meaningful and rich(not in money way).
2020, I am deeply interested in programming.
